headline.print_headline: NY Starts Inspecting Rail Yards Handling Bakken Crude: Governor
headline.main: NY Starts Inspecting Rail Yards Handling Bakken Crude: Governor

docs.snippet: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Friday officials have launched inspections at state rail yards to protect people from potential accidents involving shipments of volatile crude oil from the Bakken oil fields in North Dakota....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Friday officials have launched inspections at state rail yards to protect people from potential accidents involving shipments of volatile crude oil from the Bakken oil fields in North Dakota.

docs.snippet: In a story Feb. 28 about health care, The Associated Press incorrectly identified Rep. Cathy McMorris Rodgers as vice chairman of the Republican Conference. She is the chairman of the conference....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Feb. 28 about health care, The Associated Press incorrectly identified Rep. Cathy McMorris Rodgers as vice chairman of the Republican Conference. She is the chairman of the conference.

headline.print_headline: Kosovo PM's Party Splits Before National Election
headline.main: Kosovo PM's Party Splits Before National Election

docs.snippet: Two close allies of Kosovo's prime minister, Hashim Thaci, split from him on Friday to launch a new party to contest a national election expected to be held between June and September....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two close allies of Kosovo's prime minister, Hashim Thaci, split from him on Friday to launch a new party to contest a national election expected to be held between June and September.

headline.print_headline: How Dominant Are Shockers? Ask MVC Coaches
headline.main: How Dominant Are Shockers? Ask MVC Coaches

docs.snippet: With their votes due this weekend, Bradley's Geno Ford had an easy solution for how Missouri Valley coaches and media should decide the conference's player of the year this season....
docs.lead_paragraph: With their votes due this weekend, Bradley's Geno Ford had an easy solution for how Missouri Valley coaches and media should decide the conference's player of the year this season.

headline.print_headline: Recalls This Week: Inline Skates, Heated Gloves
headline.main: Recalls This Week: Inline Skates, Heated Gloves

docs.snippet: A line of Rollerblade inline skates is being recalled because the boot can separate from the skate frame during use. Other recalled consumer products include garage door openers and heated gloves that both pose fire hazards....
docs.lead_paragraph: A line of Rollerblade inline skates is being recalled because the boot can separate from the skate frame during use. Other recalled consumer products include garage door openers and heated gloves that both pose fire hazards.

headline.print_headline: Russian Cooperation Crucial for Resolving Ukraine's Crisis: EU Official
headline.main: Russian Cooperation Crucial for Resolving Ukraine's Crisis: EU Official

docs.snippet: Any peaceful resolution of Ukraine's political turmoil must have Russia in the mix out of concern the two nations could descend into open warfare, European Commissioner for Industry and Entrepreneurship Antonio Tajani said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Any peaceful resolution of Ukraine's political turmoil must have Russia in the mix out of concern the two nations could descend into open warfare, European Commissioner for Industry and Entrepreneurship Antonio Tajani said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Rejects Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Claim of Mistaken Identity
headline.main: U.S. Judge Rejects Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Claim of Mistaken Identity

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Friday rejected a last-ditch request from one of Osama bin Laden's sons-in-law to delay his trial after his lawyers said the government may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, with a similar name....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday rejected a last-ditch request from one of Osama bin Laden's sons-in-law to delay his trial after his lawyers said the government may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, with a similar name.
